1.content: its may 9th timmy wakes up he forgets something "what day is it today?". After the multiple hits dropped by his mother that its mothers day he says "must be another surprise quiz from mr crocker". Timmy's mom starts to cry "MOM whats wrong" "HOW CAN YOU FORGET ITS MOTHERS DAY!!!!" "OH mom I'm so sorry I'll make it up to you somehow" "ITS TOO LATE FOR THAT". A month later its fathers day and timmy forgets after the many hints his dad left him "must be another surprise quiz from mr crocker". Then timmy's dad starts to cry "dad whats wrong don't tell me its fathers day". "HOW CAN YOU FORGET I'VE GIVEN UP ON MY DREAMS FOR THIS AN UNGRATEFUL SON!!!!". "Dad I''ll make it up to you somehow" "TOO LATE GO TO YOUR ROOM AND THINK ABOUT WHAT YOU'VE NOT DONE!!!". Timmy goes to his room with his fairies "cosmo and wanda" waiting "HI TIMMY HAPPY FATHERS DAY". "WHAT YOU KNEW BUT HAVEN'T TOLD ME?!!" "HOW CAN YOU FORGET ITS FATHERS DAY". said cosmo "DON'T TELL US YOU FORGOT MOTHERS DAY TOO!" said wanda timmy nodded. "what are you going to do now" said his fairies "hmm I know I can give my parents each a wish" "thats a great idea sport" said cosmo "I don't know about this said wanda wanda checked da rules "doesn't say anything here about granting fairy god childs parents wishes but I'm still not sure about it" said wanda "come on timmy after all the countless mothers and fathers days you forgot this will really help make up for it"said cosmo "you know what cosmo your right I wish for a way in which my parents could grant their deepest desire" with a wave of their wands a purple mist emerged then dispersed with two items what are they?
1.title: mothers and fathers day

11112.content:
"I know!" Timmy's Mom shouted. "I wish i had a daughter, instead of a son! I bet that if Timmy was a girl, fen he wouldn't have forgotten about mother's day."
The gift card poofed away in a pink cloud.
11112.title: A daughter instead of a son

111121.content:
Timmy is lying on his bed tossing a baseball into the air. Proud of himself for giving the ultimate gift.

"I still think this was a bad idea sport." Wanda says worried. "Who knows what kind of wish those two idiots could make!"

"Reelax Wanda. Knowing my parents theyll probably wish for a vacation to some tropical island. A fat stack of cash or...."

A poof sound was heard at the apex of the baseballs latest throw, a stuffed pink bear landed back in his hand, the words 'Timantha' written on it's backside.

"...That you were the daughter they always wanted!" Wanda shouted before the room was washed over with magic.

everything the wave of magic touched girlified instantly. The clunky old computer was replaced with a huge vanity covered in makeup, his wardrobe exploded in size to hold more cloths than 10 guys would ever wear in their lifetime. His action figures were replaced with stuffed animals and dolls and his video game collection ceased to exist along with his consoles.

By the time the room was wall to wall pink and purple it had focused on him in a cocoon of magic. Swirling around him and stripping Timmy of his existance as a guy. It only lasted for a second but by the time it dispeled only the familiar form of the girl he had accidently wished to be to get closer to his crush was staring back at her from the masive mirorr in her room.

In fact she noticed some differences. Instead of the frilly girly outfit she had originally worn it was a pink blouse, stylish pants and pink shoes. She also looked somewhat taller, as tall as Trixie in fact, like her parents had always remembered to feed her right instead of setting meals for only two a dozen times a week forcing her to use candy as a substitute.

"Timmy?" Wanda called out. Changing back into a fairy and floating to her god....daughters side.

The ponytailed girls eye was twitching up a storm.

"I'd say I didn't want to tell you 'I told you so' but we all know thats a total lie."
111121.title: Meanwhile, in Timmy's room.....

11211.content:
Timmy was upstairs in his room just chilling playing some old video game.

Then he heard his father yelling for his name.

"Timmy could you come downstairs please."

Timmy assumed that his Dad had already made his wish.

So Timmy stopped playing his game and went downstairs to find...
11211.title: Later

112111.content:
Timmy saw his dad at the kitchen table and went to sit in the other seat, across from his father.

His dad started the conversation, "So Timmy I have come up with a way for you to make up for missing Father's Day, and to make sure that you never repeat such forgetfulness again. So your going to wear diapers again and call us daddy and mommy. You will wear and use your diapers 24/7 even to school."

How does Timmy react?...
112111.title: His dad was waiting for him at the kitchen table
